…many  because it casts out the vote of a legal United States citizen.

Finally, we hear arguments against voter ID. This is a core,  commonsense principle. My colleague, Mr. Bean, brought up the example  that it is illegal for an underage individual to purchase a beer, but  as you go to buy a beer, you get asked for your ID. As I said earlier,  I think…

…waste, the  fraud, and the abuse in places like USAID.
